## Prerequisites

In order to follow along with this module, you will need the following:

1. [R and RStudio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/) installed on your computer (see Steps 1 and 2 on that page).
2. A [GitHub account](https://github.com/signup).
3. [GitHub Desktop](https://desktop.github.com/) installed on your computer. You should be signed into GitHub Desktop with your GitHub account.
